greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of positive integers, k, where k <= 2n+1 and gcd(k, 2n+1) = gcd(k+1, 2n+1) = 1.
link: Walter Klotz, Torsten Sander, Some Properties of Unitary Cayley Graphs, The Electronic Journal of Combinatorics, Volume 14 (2007), #R45. See Corollary 7 p. 4.
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(n = 2*n+1); n*prod(p=1, n, if (isprime(p) && !(n % p), (1-2/p), 1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 02 2016
results.author: _Leroy Quet_, Nov 15 2000
